hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "If somebody eats something forgetfully while he is fasting, then he should complete his fast, for Allah has made him eat and drink

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ إِذَا حَنِثَ نَاسِيًا فِي الأَيْمَانِ
chapter.eng-name: If someone does something against his oath due to forgetfulness
